publishedfiledetails.title: Peachy Furniture
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1]Description[/h1]
This mod was created for RolePlayers (RP) who want additional furniture. It was made to look medieval is style but works for any era.  All items can be picked up  and do not require foundations to place.

Please take the time to give the mod a thumbs up and rate it. 
[img=https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]

If you like the look of this mod make sure to Rate and Favorite it and Check out my other mods:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1517403145] Peachy Decor[/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1482267887] Peachy Worktables [/url]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1587890586] Peachy Viking Decor [/url]

Also available for Atlas
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1629969292] Peachy Atlas Furniture[/url]

[b] Mod ID 1491573333[/b]

Spawn codes and Engram list can be found in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/discussions/1491573333] Discussion Tab [/url]

[h1]Peachy Furniture Bench[/h1] You need this item to craft all other Peachy Furniture items

[h1]Furniture [/h1]
[list]
There are 3 sets of furniture, Basic Furniture (matches all vanilla Ark items and can be painted), Common (mid level furniture) High End Furniture fit for lords, ladies, and royalty. 
[*]Bunk Bed x2 (Not available in high end set)
[*]Double Bed x3
[*]Single Bed x3
[*]King size bed x1
[*]Bench x3
[*]Dining Chair x3
[*]Arm Chair x3
[*]Dresser x3
[*]Large Dresser x3
[*]Large Shelf with decoration x3
[*]Small Shelf x3
[*]Bookshelf Large x6
[*]Bookshelf Small x3
[*]Sofa x3
[*]Stool x3
[*]Table x3
[*]Round Table x3
[*]Dining Table x3
[*]End Table x3
[*]Reg Throne x2
[*]Pixie Throne x1
[*]Dwarven Throne x1
[*]Elven Throne x1
[/list]
